title: Economy & Feature Update
content:
### Major Features

- **Projected Status Updates**: The economy now automatically detects projection manipulation and alerts the community.
- **Banned Copies**: Item details now show how many copies are locked in the Admin Vault.
- **Last Online**: You can now see when players were last active.
- **AI Improvements**: Trading bots are now smarter, targeting higher value trades and avoiding bad deals.
- **Leaderboard Accuracy**: Leaderboards now reflect true inventory values.

### Fixes & Improvements

- Added pagination to Value Changes page.
- AI Bans are now strictly enforced.
- Various UI improvements.
